extendedInfo.description: Play the most classic Bubble shooting game in a fun and entertaining way for FREE!! Goal of the game is to clear all the bubbles before they overflow the bottom line.Bubble shooter game is a amazing game with advanced features and highly addictive gameplay. This is more than just a bubble popping game as controls are simple and background is also very attractive. You just have to touch the screen to aim and shoot bubbles in this game. It is very exciting and challenging, and great for you to kill your free time.Feature:1. A very simple and classic yet addicting user interface.2. You can even set timer at each level to make it more challenging.3. Beautifully made and controls are excellent.4. Super Sharp HD graphics with unlimited number of levels.5. Develops concentration and focus6. No language barrier â can be played and understood by entire world.7. Easy best time and Hours to enjoy for FREE!!How to Play:1. Your goal is to clear all the colorful bubbles from the board, which will help you in scoring as many points as possible.2. You have to shoot at them, and when three or more of the same color come together, they all explode.3. Point your finger to where you want the next bubble to go, and as you put your finger on the ball, fire ball will be shotted from the trigger. If the shoted fire ball is of the same color and balls at the board is equal to or greater than 3, then the balls on the board will explode, otherwise shoted ball will get added to the board.4. The more bubbles blow up at one shot, the increasingly more points you gain.5. There is no other option in this game, either clean the board by shooting all the bubbles/balls off and increase score, or they move all the way down on you.Just play it, and get new exciting experience of bubble shooting. It can be your new addictive game for sure!If you are bored of normal hit games like Frozen Bubble, Bubble Blaster, Jungle Shooter, Marble Blaster, angry birds, solitare or cut the rope then try this fun game concept in Android and have lot fun !!It is a unique and beautifully designed bubble game and it will keep you mesmerized for hours by a continuous increase of difficulty.Enjoy this app and have loads of fun!The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. The game is also designed for tablets and Samsung galaxy Note.The appplication works perfect on all mobiles and gives you a thrilling experience on tablets. No internet connectivity is required to play this game.If you like our app, share it with your friends and family through facebook, twitter, googleplus, pinterest. Stay tuned with us as very soon we will be releasing more funny apps like honey bee war game, powerful peeing kid, luck, friend, love, health and marriage scanner & many more exciting apps based on very interesting concepts.We hope you enjoy this fun Android application!!Tags : addicting games, ball game,casual game for time pass, free games

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: Sucks you have to always start on level 1. Doesn\'t save current level. Uninstalling until fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game does not have a pause and resume option so everytime I exit the game I have to restart it from level one (1) everytime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best thing is bc changes at evry lvl
